tweets.text: Just picked up @EnvAgencyNW duty manager for #Cumbria and #Lancashire - overall looking less wet than originally expected.  Our teams will be out clearing the screens and grids of those autumn leaves to keep the rivers flowing.  Others are tracking the rain and river levels. https://t.co/syk9MdwGNv

#URGENT!
Based on preliminary data, #Azerbaijan used banned white phosphorus munitions over #Artsakh/#Karabakh causing fires to forests next to civilian communities.
In addition to #ecological disaster they aim at burning the people hidden in the forests. https://t.co/dp4xYy0Mx5

After many years our catchment, the Somerset Frome, is in receipt of project funding aiming to improve river quality & farming practices & instigating natural flood management measures. https://t.co/CEJEUhHMKg
#HS2 cant fell Jones Hill yet but they are making damned sure they trash what they can! https://t.co/WQa4UM9Lcv

Don’t make the mistake of thinking that someone else will clean up after you. 

Always #BagItBinIt to make sure we keep our water safe!
#BinIt4Beaches #RespectProtectEnjoy https://t.co/nHGLxzJ5xT
@GovernanceOcean @EnvAgency #FCRM How can we get mainstream media to recognise this good work - @BBCNews ? @vivek19674 @willxwells https://t.co/tTQxfnthCW
